definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
life/fate/order or command/to assign a name, title etc
branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Presented a quick method to construct life science subject-specific database.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种生命科学主题数据库的快速构建方法。

sentences.english: This is the website of College of Life Science, Hebei University.
sentences.chinese: 这是河北大学生命科学学院的网站。

sentences.english: Nowadays extremophilic microbes are the hotspot in life science study.
sentences.chinese: 极端环境微生物是当今生命科学领域的研究热点。

sentences.english: Professor Cheung is an internationally renowned researcher and scholar in life sciences.
sentences.chinese: 张醒钟教授是国际著名的生命科学研究专家学者。

sentences.english: There are many advantages of using computer simulation on Bio-science.
sentences.chinese: 生命科学中使用计算机仿真有其独特的优越性。

sentences.english: So the tutorial system is very fit for science students' training such as life science students.
sentences.chinese: 因此它十分适合于如生命科学等理科学生的人才培养。

sentences.english: This is the web page of KSC Life Sciences Data Archive.
sentences.chinese: 这是KSC生命科学数据文档的网页。

sentences.english: Descartes' thought is the starting point of the life science afterworld.
sentences.chinese: 笛卡儿的思想是其后世生命科学发展的出发点。

sentences.english: Selleck is one of the world leading suppliers of high-performance life-science products.
sentences.chinese: 赛力克化学是世界顶尖的高品质生命科学试剂供应商。

sentences.english: D-amino acids have great meaning to the research of life science.
sentences.chinese: 型氨基酸对生命科学的研究具有重大意义。

sentences.english: Twenty-five years ago, life science research was a different ball game.
sentences.chinese: 相比25年前，生命科学研究早已今非昔比。

sentences.english: This is the web site of School of Life Sciences, Queensland University of Technology.
sentences.chinese: 这是昆士兰科技大学生命科学学院的网站。

sentences.english: Especially for life science, more careful, do not deceptive philosophy.
sentences.chinese: 尤其是对生命科学，更要谨慎，不可妄言。

sentences.english: This is the website for The Institute of Biomedical and Life Sciences.
sentences.chinese: 这是格拉斯哥大学生物医学和生命科学学院的网站。

sentences.english: The specimens are preserved in the insect collection of Ningxia University.
sentences.chinese: 研究标本保存于宁夏大学生命科学学院昆虫标本室。

sentences.english: Specimens are deposited in the College of Life Sciences, Hebei University.
sentences.chinese: 标本保存在河北大学生命科学学院。

pinyin: sheng1 wu4 yi1 xue2 gong1 cheng2
